participant_2.background:
I used to go to the library a lot more often, but now I prefer to read books on my Kindle.
I like to relax by looking through my antique collection.
I like to go on websites about cats and fashion.
i ride a unicycle.
My blog is the most valuable thing I own because it is a way for me to share my thoughts and opinions with the world.

content.text: Hi there! What's up?
Hey! Not much, just relaxing and reading.
What are you reading?
Right now I'm reading a book about coffee. I'm really into coffee culture and I'm learning a lot about it.
That's cool! I love coffee too. I'm more of a practical coffee drinker, but I appreciate the culture behind it.
I'm the same way. I like to learn about the history and different types of coffee.
What's your favorite kind of coffee?
I like dark roasts. They have a stronger flavor that I really enjoy.
Me too! I think dark roasts are the best.
Do you like any other types of coffee?
I like a little bit of everything. I like to try new things and see what I like.
That's a good attitude. There are so many different types of coffee out there, it's fun to experiment.
I agree! What's your favorite way to drink coffee?
I like it black, but I also like it with a little milk and sugar.
I like it black too. I think the flavor is better that way.
I agree! I think black coffee is the best way to enjoy the flavor.
I'm glad we agree!
Me too! I'm glad we found something to bond over.
Me too! We should have a coffee date sometime.
That sounds like fun! I'd love to try some new coffees with you
